  2. Whiplash reversals mean Trump’s erratic trade policy is as clear as mud  The Guardian
  3. Trump’s Tariffs Are Unbelievable. Literally.  Barron's
  4. The Impending Doom of Trump’s Trade War  The Atlantic
  5. Trump’s lifelong belief in tariffs is about to face its acid test  CNN
